Articles.Content: Can somebody please point me in the direction of 3m Bi & Tri Coupler parts please?
I think I saw this in the rollcage addon - a file adding a resized part to the game without actually adding a part (file).
you can just re-size the stock parts in the config file. Look up guides on how to do it.

Normally you could just make a new copy of the directory, open the part.cfg file and change rescale=1 to rescale=2.

In this case you probably want to go to about 2.05. I made some larger tricouplers to hold rockomax 64 tanks and they kept coming unhooked on the launch pad. I think the collision meshes were hitting each other. A bit bigger should work fine.
Hm - rescalesize does not change all parameters of a part then?
